ex3.render.raytrace

Class convexPoligon

  • java.lang.Object
    • ex3.render.raytrace.Surface
      • ex3.render.raytrace.convexPoligon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IInitable

    public class convexPoligon
extends Surface
    A convex poligon class which creates a convex object. it runs through a list of points and generates an object.
    Author:
    Idomic
